channel.title: Mayan exhibit on Kickstarter
channel.description:
One of my friends is hosting a Mayan exhibit this winter, and has started a Kickstarter to get the funds to print out all the posters and etc. If any of you guys are interested, here is the email he sent me. [quote] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/27262125/mayan.jpg[/img]
Dear all, I am getting ready to present this year's pre-columbian photographic exhibit. I am planning to present it the week after Thanksgiving. As I promised before, this time I will talk about the Mayans, since everyone seems to be talking about them lately and the whole mythology behind 2012. I have posted this project on Kickstarter, which means that if I don't reach the goal by the designated date, the project won't be possible and no donations will be collected. Please help me to spread the word and support my project. For those who have attended my previous Aztec exhibits this time it's going to be bigger and improved, so you will be dazzled by what I will present. I hope to see you all at the exhibit as well!
This is the link to my Kickstarter page:
[url]https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/641259295/the-mayans-and-the-end-of-time[/url]
Thanks again,
George Zamora [/quote]

item.title: Mayan exhibit on Kickstarter
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
One of my friends is hosting a Mayan exhibit this winter, and has started a Kickstarter to get the funds to print out all the posters and etc. If any of you guys are interested, here is the email he sent me.

Dear all,
I am getting ready to present this year’s pre-columbian photographic exhibit. I am planning to present it the week after Thanksgiving. As I promised before, this time I will talk about the Mayans, since everyone seems to be talking about them lately and the whole mythology behind 2012. I have posted this project on Kickstarter, which means that if I don’t reach the goal by the designated date, the project won’t be possible and no donations will be collected.
Please help me to spread the word and support my project. For those who have attended my previous Aztec exhibits this time it’s going to be bigger and improved, so you will be dazzled by what I will present.
I hope to see you all at the exhibit as well!

This is the link to my Kickstarter page:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/641259295/the-mayans-and-the-end-of-time

Thanks again,

George Zamora
